Posts.Content: Cathleen, I am new to this message board but found your message in my search for information on Femara and Tamoxiphen. In your post you were just going on Zometa and Femara every day. Did they work to contain your cancer. I have a salivary gland cancer (adenoid cystic carcinoma) that has metastized to my lungs and am going to be starting tamoxiphen. Thanks. Dani
Posts.Title: Stage 4 breast cancer, need help
